entry.title: First post
entry.content:
Multiple people have told me I should start writing again, so I guess I’m back into the blog scene. A giant work rush killed my food blog activity, which I’d love to ramp back up again except for the bit where I hate wordpress. I spent a while searching for a suitable platform to do all blogging on, but despite how it’s 2013 it seems most platforms are still crap. Come on, you guys. Octopress seems like the best of the bunch, so let’s see how this turns out.

Please pardon the experience while construction is being done.
